function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the virus within buildings","Mitigation":"Proper operation of HVAC systems, ventilation, and filtration","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, high-efficiency filters","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, general public","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Lack of compliance with ASHRAE guidelines for building operations during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased potential health risks during building reopening","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to ASHRAE guidelines, strategic planning prior to building opening","Technologies":"ASHRAE-recommended HVAC systems and strategies","People":"Building owners, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Insufficient maintenance of water seals and ventilation pipes","Impact":"Risk of airborne transmission through plumbing systems","Mitigation":"Regular checks of water seals and ventilation pipes, proper toilet flushing practices","Technologies":"Plumbing maintenance tools, water seal monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance staff"}]}
